data.text:
CAMP ROCK

Come join us this summer for 5 days of fun, games, tumbling, arts & crafts, trampoline, and themed activities!

OUR CAMP IS OPEN TO THE PUBLIC FOR AGES 5 – 12

(CAMPERS MUST BE FULLY POTTY TRAINED IN ORDER TO ATTEND CAMP)

Follow our camp on Facebook.

Camp Hours 8am-5pm

Extended AM & PM Care is available for an additional cost.

Pre-registration is REQUIRED.

When you enroll your child in our Camp Rock Extended Care program, you are reserving space, time, and staffing whether or not your camper attends the program. If you have registered for the extended care and DO NOT show up during your designated time without a 24 hour cancellation notice, your account will be charged the fee.

7:00 am – 7:29 am $10

7:30 am – 7:59 am $10

5:00 pm – 5:29 pm $10

5:30 pm – 5:59 pm $10

Email Tasha@Showtimeapex.com to register for extended care.

—

CAMP ROCK REGISTRATION

FOR BOYS AND GIRLS AGES 5 – 12

Weekly Tuition: $225 non team members. $200 Allstar Team Members. $50 single day.

When you enroll your child in Camp Rock, you are reserving space, time, supplies, and staffing whether or not your camper attends the program.

* Camp Registration Deposit Fee of $35 is NON-REFUNDABLE AND NON-TRANSFERABLE *

* Camp registration that is pre-paid in full is NON-REFUNDABLE *

CAMP ROCK DIRECTOR: Tasha@Showtimeapex.com

We offer fun and unique daily themed activities for our campers each week!

Monday – Make Something Monday

Tuesday – Take a Trip Tuesday

Wednesday – Water Wednesday

Thursday – Throwback Thursday (Show & Tell)

Friday – PJ’s and Foodie Friday

SUMMER WEEKLY THEMES

June 10-14: Under thee Sea

June 17-21: Welcome to the Carnival

June 24-28: Colors Camp

July 1-3: Party in the USA

July 8-12: Creative Campers

July 15-19: Animal Encounters

July 22-26: Christmas in July

July 29-August 2: Olympics

August 5-9: Tropical Paradise

August 12-16: A Week of Good Works

August 19-23: End of Summer Celebration

***Camp Rock Policies***

Pre-registration is REQUIRED.

Returning Students Login

CAMP SCHEDULE

8:00am-9:00am Free time 9:00am-9:15am Morning Huddle/Rules 9:15am-10:15am Gym Games 10:15am-10:30m 1st Snack/Cubby Check 10:30am- 12:00pm Open Gym 12:00pm-12:30pm Lunch 12:30pm-1:00pm Quiet Time (Games/Reading) 1:00pm-1:15 pm Afternoon Huddle/Rules/Cubby Check 1:15pm-2:45pm Themed Activities/Craft 2:45pm-3:15pm Open Gym 3:15pm-3:45pm 2nd Snack/Cubby Check 3:45pm-4:30pm Gym Games 4:30pm – 5:00pm Quiet Time (Games/Reading)

WHAT TO BRING

Water bottle for gym area*

Morning & Afternoon Snack w/beverages*

Lunch w/beverages*

Pillow/Blanket/Stuffed Animal for Quiet Time (Optional)

Sunscreen

*** Please make sure to pack enough snacks, beverages, and lunch items for your children.

If your child does not bring a refillable water bottle and needs a beverage,

your account will be charged $1.50 for a water bottle***

—— Note ——

Electronics & Books from home are permitted and may be used before and after camp hours

(Before 8:00am, during Quiet Time, & After 4:30pm)

WHAT TO WEAR

Sneakers with Socks

T-shirt/Tank top

Shorts/Athletic Exercise Pants

Hair pulled away from face

Please contact our Camp Director with any questions – Tasha Elliott

Tasha@Showtimeapex.com

(919) 346-7300
